reviews.text: I was i Cracow with friends and i really recommend this b&b. Elegant, clean rooms. Free internet acess. Great location and friendly stuff (greetings to Ilona - very helpful, english speaking host).
reviews.title: perfect place to stay in
Poor customer service - check your booking and email before leaving home.
reviews.text: Enquired about staying here for a week from 14th - 21st June 2009.

Confirmed a price for 2 people for 7 nights and price for being picked up also in a taxi -this was all five days before travelling out to Poland. We thought this was where we were staying and just before we sent a reply asking how to make a deposit to secure the room we asked if it was a problem that two males were coming as we wanted to make sure it was a twin not double bed - we never had a reply. we sent 4 more e mails each day before we left to go to Poland and they never replied. Had to make a last minute booking elsewhere.
reviews.title: Totally gobsmacked with this little place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We sent a fresh e mail from a different e mail address making a general room enquiry and they replied with availability. I felt it was poor customer service to offer a room then not to reply to frequent communications that had been taking place. A simple reply to say that a mistake had been made or an error and there was no further availability would have been fine. As i stands i feel i have to let fellow trip advisor members know and be sure they have something confirmed and speak with someone at Angel House / Angel Apartments Before leaving home.
reviews.title: Even better than expected!

reviews.text: Maybe they don't like male only guests or they are homophobic but i definitely felt it wasn't acceptable customer service given the reviews on trip advisor.
reviews.title: Beautiful place to stay in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Angel House is a converted apartment or apartments in a residential building a little ourside the old town of Krakow. The apartments have been redone into nice modern "hotel" rooms with modern nice bathrooms. You will not believe how new and modern and nice it is from the outside of the old building. It is a fair walk from the old town down a rather dark street which might give single women or older travelers a bit of concern, but we never encountered any problem. The staff could not have been more helpful. We were catching the night train on the day we left and they let us use the common areas until our train left. We arrived on a night train and they expected us to go right there and have a free breakfast and leave our luggage. I did not expect that and we decided to go right on an Aushwicz tour that day. The staff waited in vain for three hours for us and even tried to call our house in the states to see what had happened to us. The only word of caution I would give is that there is not an elevator and it is a hard climb up five or six flights of stairs with your luggage. Krakow is an excellent city to visit. We took a walking tour of the old city which was excellent. We also took a "golf car tour" (you will know what I mean when you see them) of the old Jewish area. This was a very good choice for the money because the old Jewish area involves a lot of walking.
reviews.title: Nice modern guest house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Warm welcome on arrival and throughout. Very well looked after from start to finish. Great rooms and good location. Top place to stay.
reviews.title: very friendly great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my partner stayed here in March 2009, it was our first trip to Krakow and Poland and we both really enjoyed ourselves the B&B is lovely very clean and nice and warm which is a bonus as when we went in March it was freezing and going back to the B&B at the end of the day was lovely to warm up and have a lovely hot shower. The girl who was our host was very helpful and a sweet girl who was very knowledgable, breakfast was good cereals,bread,yoghurts,fruit which is plenty she even done breakfast for us early one day as we had a trip booked to Auschwitz and the salt mines which i must say is definately worth visting while your in Poland both very interesting. We booked our transfers and trips through the B&B and they were both reasonable and on time. Don't be put of by the appearance of the front of the building as it is lovely inside, we both had a lovely break and would go back to Poland again one day we would recommend the Angel B&B to friends and family.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B

reviews.text: just returned from a stay in angel house. After a terrifying few minutes when i thought that the outside of the place was an example of what to expect on the inside, we were taken into an excellent apartment with the most attentive hostess ever! Illona made our holiday exceptional, provoding breakfast every day and giving us advice and help throughout our stay. The rooms were beautiful, clean and comfortable, and the location was very convenient for everything. What more could you want? A fabulous holiday! thank you very much!
reviews.title: fabulous!

reviews.text: The rooms at Angel House were exquisitely kept and very spacious. Don't be put off by the older exterior of the building, these rooms are brand new. We were met in by Hanna who is a young woman with much knowledge about the city and perfect English. For our whole stay we were looked after extremely well, even when my bags were lost by the airlines, Hanna took care of it all and waited until my bags arrived the next day while we went sightseeing. There were so many little places (hidden gems) which we would not have seen without the advice of Hanna. One place which is well worth a visit is Viliczka Saltmine.
reviews.title: Stunning with a close-knit Family Atmosphere

reviews.text: The attention put into locating the b&b is well worth it. It is in the central part of the city, but removed well enough from the central square that it escapes the high energy that can characterize travelers' destinations. The attention to guests' comfort, to pleasant breakfasts, and to providing good and reliable information about the city, sets apart the innkeepers and the location. The place was spotless (not so easy to do with white walls and white floors) and breakfast was a pleasant start to the days.
reviews.title: An airy and charming place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The appartement is beautiful but the building not
reviews.title: The stay in the Angel House was beautifull,but the service wich is giving by Ilonka was very,very good.she is our Angel
wonderful b&b n good location
reviews.text: The service of the hostess Ilonka is very very good. She help the gast and the English language is good ,she have sharp eye sothat we did not pay to much by reparation by our car by the Nissan dealer in Krokow. Ilonka we are back in our house in the Netherlands but we shall not forget what you have done for us in our stay in Krakow

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: With kind regards
reviews.title: Beautiful Room, Undesirable location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wim and Rinie Linsen
reviews.title: Beautiful City / Beautiful B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best BB we stayed in. Very central, 5 minutes from the old square.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was large, the bathroom excellent with plenty of hot water and towels. The breakfast room is great - you can have tea and coffee anytime. And there`s a small balcony just outside.
reviews.title: It is not easy to find

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ilona is sweet and extremely helpful, she speaks excellent English and will help with anything - just ask.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed in the Angel House in March 2009. After reading the previous review (about cab is cheaper), I arrived there by cab instead of them picking me up. But I realized actually it is cheaper if they pick you up instead of getting a cab. It costed around 70 zloty one way by cab. But Angel House costs lower when they take you to and from the airport.
reviews.title: A clean B&B

reviews.text: There is a problem if you arrive the hotel by yourself. Angel House is an appartment rather than a hotel. With no signage from the outside, it is very hard to identify if you are in the right place. (even harder under cold weather) Without any introductions to get in a private appartment, I had to called for help. There is no way to find the right door bell without someone tells you the exact number to press.(which is not shown on the web page as well) . The building itself is quite shabby and certainly not too pleasant. But inside the angel house is nicely decorated.
reviews.title: Location, friendliness,homeliness,comfort
